author: powercode
body:
`Install-Module -Force` should be the way to say I *really* want this module installed.

Yet in some situations I have to add `-SkipPublisher` , `-AllowPrerelese` and/or  `-AllowClobber` .

This is just broken. Force should mean *just do as I say*.

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: @powercode Could you move this issue to [PowerShell/PowerShellGet](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues)? That is the repo responsible for `Install-Module`.

title: Install-Module -Force is broken (does not force an install)
